title: Circular reference when using generated endpoint types

milestone.description: stuff we need to nail down before launch

body:
### Describe the bug

`npm run check` on create-svelte demo scaffold (typescript + eslint + prettier) results in type errors.

### Reproduction

# 1: Create a new app using the demo scaffold
```
npm init svelte my-app
cd my-app
npm install
npm run dev
```

Choose the Typescript + ESlint + Prettier + Playwright

```
✔ Which Svelte app template? › SvelteKit demo app
✔ Add type checking? › TypeScript
✔ Add ESLint for code linting? … No / Yes
✔ Add Prettier for code formatting? … No / Yes
✔ Add Playwright for browser testing? … No / Yes
```

# 2: Run the type checker

```
npm run check
```

### Logs

```shell
❯ npm run check          

> my-app@0.0.1 check
> svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json


====================================
Loading svelte-check in workspace: /private/tmp/my-app
Getting Svelte diagnostics...

/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:2:15
Error: Circular definition of import alias 'RequestHandler'. 
import { api } from './_api';
import type { RequestHandler } from './index';



/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:2:15
Error: Module '"./index"' declares 'RequestHandler' locally, but it is not exported. 
import { api } from './_api';
import type { RequestHandler } from './index';



/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:4:45
Error: Binding element 'locals' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const get: RequestHandler = async ({ locals }) => {
        // locals.userid comes from src/hooks.js


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:31:46
Error: Binding element 'request' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const post: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:31:55
Error: Binding element 'locals' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const post: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:50:47
Error: Binding element 'request' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const patch: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:50:56
Error: Binding element 'locals' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const patch: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:61:45
Error: Binding element 'request' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const del: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


/private/tmp/my-app/src/routes/todos/index.ts:61:54
Error: Binding element 'locals' implicitly has an 'any' type. 

export const del: RequestHandler = async ({ request, locals }) => {
        const form = await request.formData();


====================================
svelte-check found 9 errors, 0 warnings, and 0 hints
```


### System Info

```shell
System:
    OS: macOS 12.2.1
    CPU: (10) arm64 Apple M1 Pro
    Memory: 710.97 MB / 32.00 GB
    Shell: 5.8 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 17.6.0 - /opt/homebrew/bin/node
    Yarn: 1.22.18 - ~/.yarn/bin/yarn
    npm: 8.5.2 - /opt/homebrew/bin/npm
  Browsers:
    Chrome: 100.0.4896.127
    Safari: 15.3
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: next => 1.0.0-next.37
    @sveltejs/kit: next => 1.0.0-next.320
    svelte: ^3.46.0 => 3.47.0
```


### Severity

annoyance

### Additional Information

_No response_
